TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Ceroh, title = Ceroh, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ceroh} }

S.FORM: Ceroh Itiniay i Yuli Cen no Hualien ko Ceroh a niyaro', 245 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 638 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 62 ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 398 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 38 ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 240 ko tamdaw. O pa sin to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis59 , Puyuma1 , roma2 . Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.
